title: Love a good troll 4 man -_-
body:
Playing solo Q is amazing fun, when you get matched with a 4 man and your killing the nexus but your 4 man surrender so you lose.

Deffo a fun experience.

replies.body: regardless of normals or ranked, that is NOT the point of the game. Playing solo q with 4 others is usually a bad experience

It sucks, I totally agree. Luckily, it is a punishable offence (although punishments take a lil longer as they have to be manually reviewed for cases such as this). Be sure to report players like this in the end-game screen, as consistent end of game reporting is the only way to ensure players like this are punished. 

[Here is a recent-ish case of a player being temp banned for exactly this!](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/WQdqZQOw-temp-banned-can-riot-email-me-my-chat-log?comment=0004)

> It sucks, I totally agree. Luckily, it is a punishable offence (although punishments take a lil longer as they have to be manually reviewed for cases such as this). Be sure to report players like this in the end-game screen, as consistent end of game reporting is the only way to ensure players like this are punished.

> [Here is a recent-ish case of a player being temp banned for exactly this!](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/WQdqZQOw-temp-banned-can-riot-email-me-my-chat-log?comment=0004)

if you report someone for this in a normal game you shouldn't be playing league
if you play in a 4 man pre made with the intention of surrendering just before you win the game (even in norms or bots), you shouldn't be playing league.

I feel you are little strung up about this for making a forum thread about trolling in a normals game. League is full of toxicity and trolls, this is normals you have to expect that some people are going to be idiots, just be glad it wasn't your promo series.

The original thread is regarding a ranked game 
Even if it were just a normal, it would be frustrating af to dedicate x amount of minutes towards a sure win, just to have 4 jerks surrender. 

If you are going to troll, at least do it in a 5man with people you know.

I'm not trying to condone what they did and if it was ranked that's horrible; I just don't see the point of going to the effort of making a forum post about it unless you are doing name and shame (which I can completely understand if it was promos). i see it was actually a ranked game and so this was trolling was really really mean.

People who troll in ranked are horrible people. Normals is for trolling, not ranked. I am seriously sorry for what you had to experience. Normals you can accept it and move on and while they wasted your time in the end it was no harm no foul but in ranked. People who do the 4man surrender in ranked deserve permanent +200 ping.
